title: Benchmark Gensuite
description: Benchmark ESG Reporting® offers enterprise leaders a comprehensive ESG data management platform with investment-grade insights and powerful real-time analytics, supporting sustainability commitments and culture change through user-friendly desktop and mobile applications.

title: Brightly
description: Brightly Stream™ offers scalable ESG software solutions that empower organizations to meet ambitious energy, water, and carbon targets while optimizing operational efficiency and fostering sustainable futures, all backed by over 20 years of industry expertise and a unique partnership approach.
